releases.insights: Having releases set up is important to track the health of your deployments. Make sure you have your release artifacts uploaded to Sentry.

alert_rules.insights: Setting up alert rules ensures you are notified about important issues. Verify that you have critical alert rules configured to monitor your application.

environments.insights: Configuring environments helps you track issues in different stages of your application, such as production, staging, and development.

integrations.insights: Integrating Sentry with other tools you use, like Slack or GitHub, can help streamline your workflow and ensure timely notifications and issue management.

teams.insights: Ensure that your teams are set up correctly so that the right people are assigned to handle specific issues.

members.insights: Keep your team members up to date in Sentry to ensure that notifications and permissions are correctly assigned.

notification_settings.insights: Proper notification settings ensure that alerts and updates are sent to the right channels and people.
